text: Again he began to teach by the lake. Such a large crowd gathered around him that he got into a boat on the lake and sat there while the whole crowd was on the shore by the lake.

He <st data-num="1321" class="">taught</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many things</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3850" class="">parables</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them:</st>
“<st data-num="191">Listen</st>! A <st data-num="4687" class="">sower</st> <st data-num="1831">went out</st> to <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> as he <st data-num="4687" class="">sowed</st>, <st data-num="3739">some</st> seed<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">path</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4071" class="">birds</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2719" class="">devoured</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="243" class="">Other</st> seed <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4075">rocky ground</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> it did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">much</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">soil</st>. It <st data-num="1816">sprang up</st> <st data-num="2117">at once</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">soil</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="899" class="">deep</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st> <st data-num="393">came up</st> it was <st data-num="2739" class="">scorched</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> it did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> sufficient <st data-num="4491" class="">root</st>,<n id="1" /> it <st data-num="3583" class="">withered</st>.

<st data-num="243">Other</st> seed <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="173" class="">thorns</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="305">grew up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4846" class="">choked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">produce</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">grain</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="243">other</st> seed <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">soil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">produced</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">grain</st>, <st data-num="305" class="">sprouting</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="837" class="">growing;</st> <st data-num="1520">some</st> <st data-num="5342" class="">yielded</st> <st data-num="5144">thirty times</st> as much, <st data-num="1520">some</st> <st data-num="1835" class="">sixty</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520">some</st> a <st data-num="1540">hundred times</st>.”
And he said, “Whoever has ears to hear had better listen!”
When he was alone, those around him with the Twelve asked him about the parables.
He said to them, “The secret of the kingdom of God has been given to you. But to those outside, everything is in parables,

“so that although they look they may look but not see,

and although they hear they may hear but not understand,

so they may not repent and be forgiven.”
He said to them, “Don’t you understand this parable? Then how will you understand any parable?
The <st data-num="4687" class="">sower</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sows</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>.

<st data-num="3778" class="">These</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the ones <st data-num="3844" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">path</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> is <st data-num="4687" class="">sown:</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">Whenever</st> they <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>, <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="142" class="">snatches</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st><n id="2" /> that was <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="3778" class="">These</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the ones <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4075">rocky ground</st>: <st data-num="3752">As soon as</st> they <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>, they <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4491" class="">root</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="235" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1510">do</st> <st data-num="4340">not endure</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1534" class="">Then</st>, when <st data-num="2347" class="">trouble</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1375" class="">persecution</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> of the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>, <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> they <st data-num="4624">fall away</st>.

<st data-num="243" class="">Others</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the ones <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">among</st> <st data-num="173" class="">thorns:</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">They</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> those who <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> the <st data-num="3056">word</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="165" class="">worldly</st> <st data-num="3308" class="">cares</st>, the <st data-num="539" class="">seductiveness</st> of <st data-num="4149" class="">wealth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1939" class="">desire</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3062">other things</st> <st data-num="1531">come in</st> and <st data-num="4846" class="">choke</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">produces</st> <st data-num="175" class="">nothing</st>.
But these are the ones sown on good soil: They hear the word and receive it and bear fruit, one thirty times as much, one sixty, and one a hundred.”
He also said to them, “A lamp isn’t brought to be put under a basket or under a bed, is it? Isn’t it to be placed on a lampstand?

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3756">nothing</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2927" class="">hidden</st> <st data-num="3362" class="">except</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> be <st data-num="5319" class="">revealed</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3761">and nothing</st> <st data-num="614" class="">concealed</st> <st data-num="235" class="">except</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> be <st data-num="2064" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5318" class="">light</st>.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3775" class="">ears</st> to <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>, he had better <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st>!”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="991">Take care</st> about <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>. The <st data-num="3358">measure</st> you <st data-num="3354" class="">use</st> will <st data-num="3354" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="3354" class="">measure</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3354" class="">receive</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> more will <st data-num="3354" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4369" class="">added</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.
For whoever has will be given more, but whoever does not have, even what he has will be taken from him.”
He also said, “The kingdom of God is like someone who spreads seed on the ground.

He <st data-num="2518">goes to sleep</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1453">gets up</st>, <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4703" class="">seed</st> <st data-num="985" class="">sprouts</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3373" class="">grows</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">though</st> <st data-num="846">he</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> how.

By <st data-num="844" class="">itself</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">soil</st> <st data-num="2592" class="">produces</st> a <st data-num="5528" class="">crop</st>, <st data-num="4413">first</st> the <st data-num="4719" class="">stalk</st>, <st data-num="1534" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="4719" class="">head</st>, <st data-num="1534" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="4134" class="">full</st> <st data-num="4621">grain</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4719" class="">head</st>.
And when the grain is ripe, he sends in the sickle because the harvest has come.”
He also asked, “To what can we compare the kingdom of God, or what parable can we use to present it?

It is <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4615" class="">mustard</st> <st data-num="2848" class="">seed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st>, even though it is the <st data-num="3398" class="">smallest</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4690" class="">seeds</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st>—
when it is sown, it grows up, becomes the greatest of all garden plants, and grows large branches so that the wild birds can nest in its shade.”
So with many parables like these, he spoke the word to them, as they were able to hear.
He did not speak to them without a parable. But privately he explained everything to his own disciples.
On that day, when evening came, Jesus said to his disciples, “Let’s go across to the other side of the lake.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> after <st data-num="863" class="">leaving</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, they <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> along, <st data-num="5613">just as</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="4143" class="">boats</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="2978" class="">windstorm</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">developed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2949" class="">waves</st> were <st data-num="1911" class="">breaking</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>, <st data-num="5620">so that</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st> was <st data-num="2235" class="">nearly</st> <st data-num="1072" class="">swamped</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4403" class="">stern</st>, <st data-num="2518" class="">sleeping</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="4344" class="">cushion</st>. They <st data-num="1453" class="">woke</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1453">up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3199" class="">care</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we are <st data-num="622" class="">about to die</st>?”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1326">got up</st> and <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuked</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>,<n id="3" /> “Be <st data-num="4623" class="">quiet</st>! <st data-num="5392">Calm down</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> <st data-num="2869" class="">stopped</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="1055" class="">calm</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="1169" class="">cowardly</st>? Do you <st data-num="3768">still not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>?”
They were overwhelmed by fear and said to one another, “Who then is this? Even the wind and sea obey him!”
